** 19 達生第十九

有生必先无離形，¶	KR5c0126_019:1a:7:1:1

悲夫！¶
世之人以為養形足以存生；¶	KR2b0017_074:9a:7:12:1,KR2c0021_112:64b:3:21:2,KR3k0012_720:2b:6:9:4,KR3k0012_999:2b:6:9:14118,KR5c0126_019:1a:12:1:1,KR5c0138_007:1b:1:5:1

# dating: 8110

則物之造乎不形	KR2b0017_074:10a:1:4:1,KR2c0021_083:46b:1:21:1,KR5c0049_002:3a:1:1:1,KR5c0051_007:2b:5:20:1,KR5c0120_002:006b:3:14:2,KR5c0121_002:9a:3:1:0,KR5c0122_002:006a:7:17:3,KR5c0123_004:021a:2:1:11,KR5c0123_004:022b:7:4:11,KR5c0124_002:4a:15:1:20,KR5c0125_002:6a:1:26:4,KR5c0126_019:3a:14:1:8,KR5c0127_056:007a:6:15:27,KR5c0128_020:003a:4:14:2,KR5c0135_018:002b:4:1:5,KR5c0136_010:011b:4:14:14,KR5c0138_007:2a:7:13:1,KR5c0139_021:006b:3:1:9,KR5h0057_005:009a:3:14:10,KR5i0036_004:04p002a:6:1:2

仲尼曰：¶
「子巧乎！¶
有道邪？」¶

不以萬物易蜩之翼，¶	KR1a0143_004:20b:6:16:1,KR2b0017_074:10b:6:7:1,KR2c0021_086:271a:2:20:16,KR2d0023_032:25a:6:6:2,KR2k0046_051:23a:4:13:33,KR3k0004_124:8b:2:18:13,KR3k0011_030:5a:4:1:4,KR3k0012_944:4b:13:4:9,KR3k0012_999:4b:13:4:17698,KR3k0045_092:2b:5:15:2,KR3k0049_057:68a:2:19:25,KR3k0051_010:58a:1:4:3,KR3k0058_122:13b:8:39:3,KR4c0022_010:19b:6:32:22,KR4d0079_056:9a:11:4:14,KR4d0109_051:5a:1:4:1,KR4d0109_060:12a:7:11:1,KR4f0046_016:41b:7:7:38,KR4h0022_141:11a:6:16:11,KR4h0062_037:7b:6:2:7,KR4h0139_116:34a:2:16:30,KR5b0087_000:008a:7:13:3,KR5c0049_002:5b:12:13:1,KR5c0051_007:5a:1:10:1,KR5c0120_002:017b:4:17:2,KR5c0121_002:19b:7:16:0,KR5c0121_002:20a:5:25:0,KR5c0122_003:001a:9:15:2,KR5c0122_003:001b:7:12:2,KR5c0123_005:014a:2:10:1,KR5c0123_005:015a:7:15:1,KR5c0124_002:4a:342:1:54,KR5c0125_002:13a:8:7:4,KR5c0126_019:3a:76:1:17,KR5c0127_056:013b:6:1:48,KR5c0127_056:014a:10:4:48,KR5c0128_020:006a:1:1:2,KR5c0136_010:013a:8:15:15,KR5c0138_007:3b:8:13:1,KR5c0139_021:013a:6:6:15,KR5h0057_005:011a:3:7:12,KR5i0036_004:04p003a:10:14:2,KR6s0068_005:0226b:21:19:16
何為而不得！」¶	KR1c0021_005:10a:1:24:18,KR1c0028_012:35a:5:17:89,KR1c0035_012:35a:1:19:70,KR1c0044_015:44a:4:19:76,KR2b0017_074:10b:6:15:1,KR2c0021_086:271a:3:7:16,KR2d0023_032:25a:6:14:2,KR2k0046_051:23a:5:1:33,KR3d0002_001:11b:5:18:9,KR3k0004_124:8b:2:26:13,KR3k0012_944:4b:13:12:9,KR3k0012_999:4b:13:12:17698,KR3k0045_092:2b:6:2:2,KR3k0049_057:68a:3:6:25,KR3k0051_010:58a:1:12:3,KR3k0056_223:22b:5:18:4,KR3k0058_122:14a:1:5:3,KR4c0022_010:19b:6:40:22,KR4d0051_012:31b:3:4:79,KR4f0046_016:41b:7:15:38,KR5c0124_002:4a:343:1:54,KR5c0125_002:13a:8:15:4,KR5c0126_019:3a:77:1:17,KR5c0138_007:3b:8:21:1,KR6i0341_003:0307a:13:2:177,KR6i0342_003:0128b:2:23:90,KR6s0068_005:0226b:22:7:16

而便操之也。』¶	KR1j0065_021:9b:8:17:6,KR2b0017_074:11a:1:17:1,KR3a0043_002:26b:5:11:4,KR3k0004_137:5b:7:41:3,KR3k0004_137:5b:8:37:3,KR3k0012_395:6b:11:2:11,KR3k0012_999:6b:11:2:11151,KR3k0045_043:23b:6:5:6,KR3k0045_043:23b:8:1:6,KR3k0055_391:24a:8:14:5,KR3k0055_391:24a:8:40:5,KR3k0056_054:53b:8:31:9,KR3k0056_155:58a:1:23:4,KR3k0056_157:18a:3:2:2,KR4d0080_058:64a:2:10:112,KR4d0086_006:34a:1:10:32,KR4d0109_051:4b:7:20:1,KR5c0051_007:5a:7:8:1,KR5c0051_007:5b:2:7:1,KR5c0121_002:18a:3:41:0,KR5c0126_019:3a:92:6:20,KR5c0126_019:3a:98:11:21,KR5c0127_056:015a:4:13:48,KR5c0127_056:015a:6:17:48,KR5c0127_056:016a:2:14:48,KR5c0128_020:006b:7:13:2,KR5c0128_020:006b:9:17:2,KR5c0135_018:004a:1:17:6,KR5c0135_018:004a:4:2:6,KR5c0136_010:013b:3:12:16,KR5c0136_010:013b:5:16:16,KR5c0138_007:4a:4:27:1,KR5c0138_007:4a:7:5:1,KR5c0139_021:014a:8:11:16,KR5c0139_021:014b:7:11:17,KR5h0057_005:011b:4:14:13,KR5h0057_005:011b:7:1:13,KR5i0036_004:04p003b:5:17:2,KR5i0036_004:04p003b:7:10:2

而鞭之。』」¶

威公曰：¶
「何謂也？」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_019-8a>¶

# src: ZHUANG 19.5.8 Guo Qingfan 647; Wang Shumin 686; Fang Yong 496; Chen Guying 476
# dating: 8110
仲尼曰：¶
「无入而藏，¶	KR5c0126_019:3a:144:1:30
无出而陽，¶	KR5c0126_019:3a:145:1:30,KR5d0087_001:004b:2:15:15

# dating: 8110
為彘謀，¶
曰：
不如食以穅糟	KR5c0126_019:3a:168:2:33
而錯之牢筴之中，¶	KR2c0021_112:65a:5:3:2,KR2d0023_004:13b:3:7:9,KR3k0025_098:57a:8:10:30,KR3k0045_053:16b:3:14:6,KR3k0049_054:58b:1:16:5,KR3k0055_441:73a:8:41:15,KR3k0056_171:12b:2:20:8,KR3k0058_131:3a:8:2:2,KR4c0049_043:5a:11:12:12,KR4c0049_048:5a:11:12:795,KR4d0074_041:2a:8:23:7,KR5c0051_007:7b:8:8:1,KR5c0126_019:3a:168:8:33,KR5c0127_056:019b:2:5:48,KR5c0128_020:009b:5:5:2,KR5c0135_018:005b:6:5:8,KR5c0136_010:015b:3:14:18,KR5c0138_007:5b:7:13:1,KR5c0139_021:020b:5:11:23,KR5h0057_005:013b:5:6:16,KR5i0036_004:04p005a:3:12:2
自為謀，¶
則苟生
有軒冕之尊，¶	KR1d0022_002:44a:6:11:1,KR2c0021_112:65a:5:16:2,KR2d0023_004:13b:3:20:9,KR3k0039_010:18a:3:27:2,KR3k0045_053:16b:4:6:6,KR3k0058_131:3a:8:15:2,KR5c0051_007:8a:1:4:1,KR5c0126_019:3a:170:4:33,KR5c0127_056:019b:3:1:48,KR5c0128_020:009b:6:1:2,KR5c0136_010:015b:4:10:18,KR5c0138_007:5b:8:5:1,KR5c0139_021:020b:6:7:23,KR5h0057_005:013b:6:2:16,KR5i0036_004:04p005a:4:1:2

「請問，¶

# dating: 8110
皇子曰：¶
「委蛇，¶

桓公辴然而笑曰：¶	KR4c0076_007:15a:1:22:7,KR5c0126_019:3a:228:1:42,KR5c0127_057:001b:6:11:2,KR5c0128_020:010b:10:11:2,KR5c0136_010:016a:9:6:18,KR5c0139_021:023b:8:7:26
「此寡人之所見者也。」¶	KR2c0021_044:117b:6:14:2,KR3k0055_272:2b:3:13:3,KR3k0058_111:3b:4:28:2,KR4c0076_007:15a:1:29:7,KR4d0323_039:59a:4:38:81,KR4h0021_006:10a:7:7:16,KR4h0021_021:10a:7:7:161,KR5c0051_007:9a:6:6:1,KR5c0126_019:3a:229:1:42,KR5c0127_057:001b:7:1:2,KR5c0128_020:011a:1:1:2,KR5c0135_018:006b:5:6:9,KR5c0136_010:016a:9:13:18,KR5c0138_007:6b:6:17:1,KR5c0139_021:023b:8:14:26,KR5h0057_005:014b:3:14:17,KR5i0036_004:04p005b:10:3:2,KR6q0221_032:0782a:6:5:6

與之坐，¶
不終日
而不知病之去也。	KR2c0021_044:117b:7:12:2,KR2d0023_019:21a:6:8:2,KR3k0055_272:2b:4:11:3,KR3k0058_111:3b:5:5:2,KR4c0076_007:15a:2:5:7,KR4d0080_038:20a:7:2:65,KR5c0051_007:9a:7:9:1,KR5c0126_019:3a:231:4:42,KR5c0127_057:001b:8:3:2,KR5c0127_057:002b:2:13:2,KR5c0128_020:011a:2:3:2,KR5c0135_018:006b:6:8:9,KR5c0136_010:016a:10:15:18,KR5c0138_007:6b:7:15:1,KR5c0139_021:024a:2:12:26,KR5h0057_005:014b:4:15:17,KR5i0036_004:04p005b:10:22:2,KR5i0036_004:04p012a:10:19:2,KR6q0219_002:0043b:17:10:323

<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_019-13a>¶
紀渻子為王養鬭雞，¶	KR1j0012_013:11b:8:19:19,KR3k0045_084:2b:2:1:2,KR3k0056_106:9a:3:36:2,KR5c0126_019:13a:1:1:43,KR5c0138_007:7a:4:34:1

「雞已乎？」¶
曰：¶
「未也，¶
方虛憍
而恃氣。」¶

# dating: 8110
孔子曰：¶
「何謂始乎故，¶	KR2c0021_086:270a:3:6:16,KR3k0045_114:21a:1:3:4,KR3k0058_122:13b:4:36:3,KR5c0049_002:5b:5:14:1,KR5c0051_007:11b:3:6:1,KR5c0120_002:016b:5:11:2,KR5c0121_002:19a:5:15:0,KR5c0122_002:015a:10:13:3,KR5c0123_005:012a:1:15:1,KR5c0124_002:4a:311:1:51,KR5c0125_002:12b:5:9:4,KR5c0126_019:13a:50:1:51,KR5c0127_057:006a:6:10:28,KR5c0128_020:012b:7:10:2,KR5c0135_018:007b:1:13:10,KR5c0138_007:8a:1:24:1,KR5c0139_021:027b:5:4:30,KR5h0057_005:015b:2:12:18,KR5i0036_004:04p006b:5:24:2

其巧專

少焉，¶

逍遙乎无事之業，¶	KR5c0126_019:18a:16:1:64
是謂為而不恃，¶	KR2c0021_112:66a:3:5:2,KR5c0126_019:18a:17:1:64,KR5c0138_007:9b:5:28:1

今汝飾知以驚愚，¶	KR2c0021_112:66a:3:15:2,KR3k0056_006:2a:7:38:2,KR5c0051_007:14a:6:20:1,KR5c0126_019:18a:19:1:65,KR5c0127_057:014a:5:7:61,KR5c0128_020:016b:6:7:2,KR5c0135_018:009a:7:14:11,KR5c0136_010:018b:4:6:21,KR5c0138_007:9b:6:28:1,KR5c0139_021:034a:6:1:36,KR5h0057_005:017b:6:9:20,KR5i0036_004:04p008a:8:28:2

无中道夭於聾盲跛蹇	KR5c0126_019:18a:24:1:65
而比於人數，¶	KR2c0021_112:66a:5:14:2,KR5c0051_007:14b:1:3:1,KR5c0126_019:18a:24:10:65,KR5c0127_057:014a:7:14:61,KR5c0128_020:016b:8:14:2,KR5c0135_018:009a:10:2:11,KR5c0136_010:018b:6:13:21,KR5c0138_007:9b:8:17:1,KR5c0139_021:034b:2:3:37,KR5h0057_005:017b:8:16:20,KR5i0036_004:04p008b:1:1:2
亦幸矣，¶
又何暇乎天之怨哉！¶	KR2c0021_112:66a:6:1:2,KR5c0051_007:14b:1:11:1,KR5c0126_019:18a:26:1:65,KR5c0127_057:014a:8:5:61,KR5c0128_020:016b:9:5:2,KR5c0135_018:009a:10:10:11,KR5c0136_010:018b:7:4:21,KR5c0138_007:10a:1:4:1,KR5c0139_021:034b:2:11:37,KR5h0057_005:017b:9:7:20,KR5i0036_004:04p008b:1:9:2
子往矣！」¶

孫子出。¶
扁子入，¶
坐有閒，¶

扁子曰：¶「不然。¶	KR2c0021_112:66b:3:2:2,KR5c0051_007:14b:7:15:1,KR5c0126_019:18a:47:1:69,KR5c0127_057:014b:5:8:61,KR5c0128_020:017a:5:9:2,KR5c0135_018:009b:6:15:12,KR5c0136_010:019a:3:8:21,KR5c0138_007:10a:6:5:1,KR5c0139_021:035b:6:1:38,KR5h0057_005:018a:5:10:20,KR5i0036_004:04p008b:5:7:2
